page.title: 03St.Albans Chapter House.
page.content: In 1981 the only {modern building} along side an ancient cathedral was opened to provide facilities for the parish,diocese, local community and tourists. After an archeological dig, the 20th century building was erected on the site of the original chapter house from specially made Roman style bricks It contains a {refectory,}providing light meals for visitors and a {song {school}for choir practice. It also houses the{theological lib- {rary,}which is open to the Christian Study Centre and general public.In the {crypt}many youth organisations meet, including the Bones Bar for unemployed youths.The new Chapter house has made a trememdous difference.The cathedral work is more efficient,{societies }and the {shop}have facilities and visitors are made more welcome.
